definition: palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: In cesarean section, the peritoneum should be sutured to provide a favorable condition for next operation.
sentences.chinese: 行剖宫产术时应缝合腹膜，为下次手术创造有利条件。

sentences.english: More than 2 cases of maternal uterine scar due to reasons outside the cesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 余2例产妇因瘢痕子宫外的原因而进行剖宫产术。

sentences.english: High rate of cesarean section is caused by certain socialist and clinical factors.
sentences.chinese: 剖宫产术率高存在一定的社会和医源性因素。

sentences.english: When the aura of birth or plan to dismantle suture cesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 当出现了临产先兆或计划施行剖宫产时再拆除缝线。

sentences.english: Conclusion There′ s no significant effect of ECS on the type of temperament in infants.
sentences.chinese: 结论社会因素剖宫产对婴儿的气质类型无显著影响。

sentences.english: Lochia rubra will recurred several times during puerperium, especially in CS group.
sentences.chinese: 产后恶露具有波动性，尤其是剖宫产组。

sentences.english: The social factor rose to the first.
sentences.chinese: 剖宫产指征中社会因素上升到首位。

sentences.english: The Caesarean delivery rate increased from 6% to 26%.
Objective To investigate the clinical value of Zhou's Caesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨周氏剖宫产术的临床应用价值。

sentences.english: Objective To describe the reasons for pregnant women choosing cesarean section without medical indication.
sentences.chinese: 目的深入探讨无剖宫产指征孕妇选择剖宫产的原因。

sentences.english: Objective To describe the reasons for pregnant women choosing cesarean section without medical indication.
sentences.chinese: 目的深入探讨无剖宫产指征孕妇选择剖宫产的原因。

sentences.english: Methods The indications of cesarean section that took place in hospitals both in city and in the country were analysed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法对城乡两所医院剖宫产指征进行了回顾性分析。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the affection of cesarean for gynecological re-operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨剖宫产手术对再次妇科手术的影响。

sentences.english: Analyse postpartum palace medicine stream effect bearing child next time?
sentences.chinese: 剖宫产后药流影响下次生育吗？

sentences.english: Conclusion The key point of reducing the incidence of pernicious placenta praevia is to step down the rate of cesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 结论降低剖宫产率是减少凶险型前置胎盘发生的关键。

definition: to give birth without complications/easy childbirth/safe delivery/natural birth (without surgical operation)
woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
